successes.title: Shrunk down an Arduino to the size of a finger-tip!
successes.description: RFduino: A finger-tip sized, Arduino compatible, wireless enabled microcontroller, low cost enough to leave in all of your projects!

Pledges.description: Follow along with everything we are doing and be a part of the project.  Every pledge is appreciated. Thank you!  (All below pledge levels include this pledge level.)
RFduino and Color RGB LED/pushbutton shield accessory board. (with preloaded sketch)
RFduino and servo shield accessory board. (with preloaded sketch)
RFduino and USB shield accessory board.
RFduino with Color RGB LED/pushbutton shield accessory board and dual AAA battery holder shield accessory board (with preloaded sketch).
RFduino with USB shield accessory board and Color RGB LED/pushbutton shield accessory board.
RFduino with USB shield accessory board, servo shield accessory board, dual AAA battery shield accessory board and a proto shield accessory board.
RFduino with USB shield accessory board, servo shield accessory board, Color RGB LED/pushbutton shield accessory board, dual AAA battery shield accessory board and a proto shield accessory board.

PROJECT KIT - Two RFduinos with one each of the following: USB shield accessory board, servo shield accessory board, Color RGB LED/pushbutton shield accessory board, dual AAA battery shield accessory board and a proto shield accessory board.
GET IT ALL KIT - Two RFduinos, plus one each of all shield accessory boards (Kit allows you to try them all).
GET IT ALL (MULTI-PROJECT) KIT - Five RFduinos, two USB shield accessory boards, plus one each of all other shield accessory boards (Kit for a couple of projects).
GET IT ALL (MASTER DEVELOPER) KIT - Ten RFduinos, plus two each of all shield accessory boards (Kit for multiple projects).
